Articles.Content:
I found the russian counterpart of the ALSV its called the MAKS and has 3 versions of it

MAKS (normal manned version)

MAKS-T (cargo version)

MAKS-M (Advanced version)

Anything the russians didnt copy? Lil jk

Is that the atanov 225?

- - - Updated - - -

Yeah its the antonov 225

Maybe these pictures help you on the ALSV

- - - Updated - - -

Here is one with an open bay, might be useful for you
So cool
If you need more info or anything else just ask it would be wonderful if i could help you with something

Can anyone help me? I downloaded the crawler and the tower is completely black, not only that but the icons for parts in the editor sometimes completely disappear, and parts are not visible. This happened to be at least twice withing the last couple of days, and I'm starting to get worried about my save file. If anyone has any similar problem and/or knows how to fix it, please let me know. Thanks

Can anyone help me? I downloaded the crawler and the tower is completely black, not only that but the icons for parts in the editor sometimes completely disappear, and parts are not visible. This happened to be at least twice withing the last couple of days, and I'm starting to get worried about my save file. If anyone has any similar problem and/or knows how to fix it, please let me know. Thanks

Has it been only with this mod or ofher mods too?
This happened once before, before I downloaded the crawler, so I'm not sure what the problem is.

Infernal robotics was well knows for their parts turning black... I wonder

- - - Updated - - -

Sorry. The crawler does have a bit more work to do on it. Hopefully next update it will be finished
That's happening to me now

I do have Infernal Robotics installed. Though my worries just got higher, I tried starting the game, and once the save loaded, kerbin was completely invisible, all I could see was the clouds from Environmental visual enhancements. I looked at the debug menu and apparently I got an "Out of Memory" nullref. I assume this is not a good thing.

Infernal robotics was well knows for their parts turning black... I wonder

- - - Updated - - -

Sorry. The crawler does have a bit more work to do on it. Hopefully next update it will be finished

Whats comming in next update?

You might be out of memory especially with EVE installed.

If you give me 24 hours I will try to make a fix for it.

Did you download the recent version of the crawler from page one download?

There is only 1 thing for me in game black and that is the saturn booster and i also have infernal robots running so i dont know pall, i have removed infernal robots and after it everything turned back to normal

Whats comming in next update?

More items/vehicles and more work done to current stuff

- - - Updated - - -

Got a saturn booster revamp coming. Old one is dumb

More items/vehicles and more work done to current stuff

- - - Updated - - -

Got a saturn booster revamp coming. Old one is dumb

Aah okey cant wait i would like to help you where needed if thats okey with you

I would like to offer help but unsure what I can offer you.

You can be a part tester. Make reports on issues on anything in the pack, come up with ideas, have a go at editing cfg files. Whatever you can think of.
Mike, this Valkyrie is magnificent!

Mike, this Valkyrie is magnificent!

Yes! Not quite finished however. Definately suits your username!

Its an amazing vehicle. I enjoyed learning about it, shame about its fate...

I am currently sending a querie to DECQ to see if we can take over his unfinished N-1 Project and going to see if raidernick would like to join us in the putting together process!

In fasa & tantares

Awwww

Now that I think about it, I could potentially provide help maybe a week from now or so, I'm pretty focused on studying for a test this week. After all, I decided to run the game bare stock, so I could be a good baseline for the mod. I don't trust my skill in config editing, I have done some before in stock and some mod parts, but it was really only simple stuff like cost and max temperature. Other than that I can test some parts that you need help with soon enough. Ill contact you when I feel like I'm in a position to help.

Edited September 15, 2015 by Noname115
Changed my mind

Mike! Idea! Do you know the world of Eyes Turned Skywards?

If you haven't, and want something to model, then here you go: http://wiki.alternatehistory.com/doku.php/timelines/eyes_turned_skyward
Seems intriguing. I will have a read tonight. Thanks
